channel.title: Moparscape downloading screen
channel.description:
HELLO
i've been playing moparscape for a few weeks.. but i've just started playing on a new computer account and moparscape login screen isnt working =/ (heres the sequence i go through -.-)
go to mopar, it says downloading files all the way from 1-100%, it takes about 5 minutes literally, soon as it gets to 100 the whole mopar program including the forums just closes off and says that i have an error running time etc...
can someone tell me what i need to do to begin playing mopar again =([br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 12:43:27 AM[/size][hr]HEEELPPP!!!
going to sleep be back tomorrow..(12 hours max)

item.title: Moparscape downloading screen
item.dc:creator: @phat_person phat_person
item.description:
@phat_person wrote:

hmm…how do i do that? =p

all i did was click on moparscape v3.2 webclient on google and it had the agreement thing and i typed yes at the bottom and click “i agree”. Then moparscape started loading maps, files, all of this…now on the new computer account it just loads files 1-100% then closes at 100.

where do i re-download again?

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape downloading screen
item.dc:creator: @phat_person phat_person
item.description:
@phat_person wrote:

can someone tell me where to download all of this stuff to play mopar!?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 11:53:43 AM[/size][hr]???

item.title: Moparscape downloading screen

item.description:

That happend to me. All your browsers go off.
What I done to get around it was downloading the client. or the latest Java etc.
